description: A high-priority protocol that unconditionally forbids the use of the `reset_all` tool.

rules.description: The `reset_all` tool is strictly forbidden under all circumstances. It is a legacy tool that has been superseded by more granular and safer methods of workspace management. Its use is considered a critical failure.
rules.enforcement: This rule is enforced by the `master_control.py` orchestrator, which will immediately terminate the workflow with an error if an attempt is made to call this tool.
